<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_ux_addon_event_mapping"><sys_ux_addon_event_mapping action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Reference Search field decorator wired to Standard Record Page's Open Modal</description><name>Record Page Tabs Reference Search</name><parent_macroponent display_value="">!!!sys_id_1819!!!</parent_macroponent><source_da display_value="ref_search">c6542741ff13101035be517f793bf1bb</source_da><source_element_id>record_page_tabs_1</source_element_id><sys_class_name>sys_ux_addon_event_mapping</sys_class_name><sys_created_by/><sys_created_on/><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>!!!sys_id_1844!!!</sys_id><sys_mod_count/><sys_name/><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="">!!!app_sys_id!!!</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="">!!!app_sys_id!!!</sys_scope><sys_update_name/><sys_updated_by/><sys_updated_on/><target_event display_value="RECORD#OPEN_MODAL">509663140f0310107d20409dc4767e00</target_event><target_payload_mapping>{
